name: electron-typescript-react-boilerplate
description: Electron boilerplate with typescript and react support

scripts.start: concurrently "cd renderer && npm start" "cd main && wait-on http://localhost:3000/ && npm start"
scripts.watch: concurrently "cd renderer && npm start" "cd main && wait-on http://localhost:3000/ && npm run watch"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd renderer && npm install" "cd main && npm install"

author: CodeColde
